name: Battlemage VR
detailed_description:
As one of the last surviving battlemages it is your duty to cleanse the world of the evil creatures taking over. The magic crystals once hidden and thought to be safe have gotten into the wrong hands and now their powers are being used to spawn monsters. Slay the monsters that plague the lands and retrieve the magic crystals. Collect coin and purchase unique melee and magic weapons. Gain experience from your kills to level up and become an all-powerful battlemage.

Notable Features


  • Melee and magic weapons
  • Teleportation and sliding locomotion
  • Third person camera controls
  • Full body IK
  • Gain XP, level up, and spend skill points
  • Light character customization
  • High quality graphics

short_description: Dive into one of the most vibrant environments in VR to date. Play as one of the last surviving battlemages using unique melee and magic weapons to slay monsters and retrieve the magic crystals. Collect coin and experience from your kills to become the most powerful battlemage to have ever existed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590, equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290, equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 Bit and HTC Vive required

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel™ Core™ i7-6700, equivalent or better
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1070 or AMD equivalent or greater.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 Bit and HTC Vive required
